about_the_game:
OnSlaught puts you in the pilot seat of a never ending nightmare - where an entire alien civilization wants you dead. You'll face diverse enemies, each demanding a unique weapon and strategy to defeat, similar to classic boomer shooters with the added movement freedom of space.

EXPLORE MONSTROUS ENVIRONMENTS

Each level presents new challenges and opportunities for you. Slingshot around black holes, destroy flesh abominations, and outmaneuver colossal lasers as you progress deeper into the darkness of space.

ENGAGE AND DESTROY:

Master all nine of your weapons and use your grappling hook to hurl objects at armies of ships as you battle your way to salvation.

ONE MAN VERSUS GOD

You are David—a being forged from pain and suffering, standing against an unstoppable Goliath. Your expedition will bring inhuman amounts of agony, testing your will and resolve. Will you rise and defeat the trials of death, or let yourself slip back into the void?

short_description: OnSlaught is a 3rd person space game, but with the chaotic game mechanics from classic boomer shooters! Take on relentless hoards of alien ships with a unique arsenal of weapons as you obliterate destructible environments and enemies alike, in this game of action, carnage, and hell.
